metadata.name: Linux Doas Conf File Creation
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of doas.conf file in linux host platform.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(file.path), lower('/etc/doas.conf')))

output.summary: Detects the creation of doas.conf file in linux host platform.
